mapper.select: SELECT TEAMPOSTID, TEAMPOSTTITLE, TEAMPOSTCONTENT, TEAMPOSTCREATE, MEMBERID, PROJECTID FROM team_post
mapper.insert: insert into TEAM_POST(TEAMPOSTID, TEAMPOSTTITLE, TEAMPOSTCONTENT, TEAMPOSTCREATE, MEMBERID, PROJECTID) values(team_post_seq.NEXTVAL, #{teamPostTitle}, #{teamPostContent}, #{teamPostCreate}, #{memberId}, #{projectId});
